接口的使用
org.springframework.http.client.ClientHttpRequestInterceptor

  • 使用ClientHttpRequestInterceptor的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.http.client
    Contains an abstraction over client-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.http.client.support
    This package provides generic HTTP support classes, to be used by higher-level classes like RestTemplate.

    • org.springframework.http.client中ClientHttpRequestInterceptor的使用

      类型变量类型为ClientHttpRequestInterceptor的org.springframework.http.client中的构造器参数 
      构造器和说明
      InterceptingClientHttpRequestFactory(ClientHttpRequestFactory requestFactory, java.util.List<ClientHttpRequestInterceptor> interceptors)
      Create a new instance of the InterceptingClientHttpRequestFactory with the given parameters.

    • org.springframework.http.client.support中ClientHttpRequestInterceptor的使用

      实现ClientHttpRequestInterceptor的org.springframework.http.client.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BasicAuthenticationInterceptor
      ClientHttpRequestInterceptor to apply a given HTTP Basic Authentication username/password pair, unless a custom Authorization header has been set before.
      class  BasicAuthorizationInterceptor
      已过时。 
      as of 5.1.1, in favor of BasicAuthenticationInterceptor which reuses HttpHeaders.setBasicAuth(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), sharing its default charset ISO-8859-1 instead of UTF-8 as used here
      返回变量类型为ClientHttpRequestInterceptor的类型的org.springframework.http.client.support中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.List<ClientHttpRequestInterceptor> InterceptingHttpAccessor.getInterceptors()
      Return the request interceptors that this accessor uses.
      类型变量类型为ClientHttpRequestInterceptor的org.springframework.http.client.support中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void InterceptingHttpAccessor.setInterceptors(java.util.List<ClientHttpRequestInterceptor> interceptors)
      Set the request interceptors that this accessor should use.
